thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Altura Energy Qtrly Adjusted Funds Flow Per Share $0.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Altura Energy Qtrly Adjusted Funds Flow Per Share $0.02
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Altura Energy Inc:
* ALTURA ENERGY INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS, SALE OF ASSETS FOR $28.4 MILLION AND ACCELERATION OF LEDUC-WOODBEND DEVELOPMENT
* ALTURA ENERGY INC QTRLY TOTAL AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION 1,215 BOE/D VERSUS 1,015 BOE/D
* ALTURA ENERGY INC QTRLY PETROLEUM AND NATURAL GAS SALES $4.5 MILLION VERSUS $4.2 MILLION
* ALTURA ENERGY INC QTRLY ADJUSTED FUNDS FLOW PER SHARE $0.02
* ALTURA ENERGY INC - ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT FOR SALE OF ITS EAST CENTRAL ALBERTA AND SASKATCHEWAN ASSETS FOR CASH CONSIDERATION OF $28.4 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
